summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 10th Avenue Northeast, from East 40th Street to East 85th Street; East 41st Street, East 42nd Street and East 43rd Street, each from 10th Avenue Northeast to 11th Avenue Northeast; East 63rd Street, from 10th Avenue Northeast to Brooklyn Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6310, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
